questions: Can you provide an overview of your experience in the Information Technology industry?
What specific skills or expertise do you possess that make you a valuable asset in this field?
How have you stayed current with technological advancements and industry trends during your 3.7 years of experience?
Can you discuss a project or accomplishment that you are particularly proud of in your IT career?
How do you approach problem-solving and troubleshooting in IT-related situations?
Have you worked with any specific technologies or software platforms that have been instrumental in your career development?
How do you prioritize and manage tasks in a fast-paced IT environment?
Can you discuss a time when you had to collaborate with a team to successfully complete a project in IT?
How do you handle challenges or setbacks in your work within the Information Technology industry?
How do you see yourself growing and advancing in the IT field in the future?
